#summary Development with Maven.
#labels Maven,Repository

= Use Maven repository =

To use Android Commons Maven repository just add next lines to the repositories section of your POM:
{{{
  <repository>
    <id>androidcommons</id>
    <name>Android Commons Repository</name>
    <url>http://androidcommons.googlecode.com/svn/maven-repository/</url>
    <releases>
      <enabled>true</enabled>
      <updatePolicy>never</updatePolicy>
    </releases>
    <snapshots>
      <enabled>false</enabled>
    </snapshots>
  </repository>
}}}
